metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12626 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4. A CSRF attack can cause an authenticated user to be logged out because POST was not considered.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-12626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4+dfsg.1-1').
